methods.name: writeNBT
methods.description: Serialize the capability instance to a NBTTag. This allows for a central implementation of saving the data. It is important to note that it is up to the API defining the capability what requirements the 'instance' value must have. Due to the possibility of manipulating internal data, some implementations MAY require that the 'instance' be an instance of the 'default' implementation. Review the API docs for more info.

methods.name: readNBT
methods.description: Read the capability instance from a NBT tag. This allows for a central implementation of saving the data. It is important to note that it is up to the API defining the capability what requirements the 'instance' value must have. Due to the possibility of manipulating internal data, some implementations MAY require that the 'instance' be an instance of the 'default' implementation. Review the API docs for more info. *
